timeline.message: XRDDEV-403 log more details to STDOUT
XRDDEV-403 added error logging related to connectivity problems, file system errors
XRDDEV-403 added logging to rate limit and size limit, startStopListener. fix bad file-upload-endpoints config
XRDDEV-403 copy log messages from old proxy-ui module
XRDDEV-403 improve logging to follow conventions better, fix error code missing_parameter to follow conventions
XRDDEV-403 fix logback config to include org.niis.xroad
XRDDEV-403 update logs in user guide

timeline.bodyText: The version number of the doc should be incremented too
timeline.author: iluwatar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1884,6 +1884,7 @@ The most important system services of a security server are as follows. `xroad-jetty ` | Application server running the user interface | `/var/log/xroad/jetty/` `xroad-proxy` | Message exchanger | `/var/log/xroad/proxy.log` `xroad-signer` | Manager process for key settings | `/var/log/xroad/signer.log` + `xroad-proxy-ui-api` | Management UI and REST API | `/var/log/xroad/proxy_ui_api.log` and
`/var/log/xroad/proxy_ui_api_access.log`

timeline.bodyText: This change seems unrelated to logging, intentional?
timeline.author: iluwatar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ file-upload-endpoints:
       pathEnding: /tls-certificates
     -
       httpMethod: POST
-      pathEnding: /certificates
+      pathEnding: /token-certificates

replies.bodyText: Yes it is intentional, I noticed that endpoint names had been updated /certificates -> /token-certificates, but this configuration file had not been updated accordingly. It is unrelated to logging, indeed.
replies.author: jansu76

timeline.message: XRDDEV-403 add change log and update version of SS user guide
